tossup_question: 42) PHYSICS  Name two massless particles in the Standard Model of particle physics.
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Photon, Gluon (DO NOT ACCEPT: Graviton, Electron neutrino)
bonus_question: 42) PHYSICS  Two spheres of mass M have centers d apart, and the gravitational force between them has magnitude F. What is the magnitude of the gravitational force between two spheres, one of mass 3M and one of mass 4M, with centers 5d apart?
